item.title: Tender Moments in Books and Movies
item.description: 📚 Books and Movies give us someplace to go when we have to stay where we are. 📽 Chapter 1 Books The start of reading 小時候的我一直是一個很愛逛書店、愛看書的小女孩。那時候讀了好多媽媽從她學校圖書館裡借閱的經典名著，比如《紅與黑》、《唐吉軻德》、《簡·愛》、《呼嘯山莊》、《巴黎聖母院》等等，不管能不能理解，我都囫圇吞棗地讀下去。從那時起書就成了我的良師益友，陪著我一天天長大。 長大後愈發明白的書之於我成長的意義，雖然很多我已記不起情節、記不起主人公的經歷，但就像三毛所說：「讀書多了，容顏自然改變，許多時候，自己可能以為許多看過的書籍都成了過眼雲煙，不復記憶，其實他們仍是潛在的。在氣質里，在談吐上，在胸襟的無涯，當然也可能顯露在生活和文字裡。」我也漸漸明白，閱讀是一個非常複雜的心理感知過程。簡單地說，首先，將最難以捉摸的內容概念化和口頭化，轉換為文字和符號，然後從語言「解碼」回到經驗。這需要一定的智能。最重要的是，它要求我們的關注和專注，而在當今這個注意力極度分散的世界中，這項技能變得越來越罕見。 所以繼續讀下去吧！總歸是好的。 The feeling of reading 近幾年我讀書讀得越來越慢了，總覺得自己不是在讀書而是盛書，在等一些字句緩慢地注滿我，也不消化，就盛著它們晃晃蕩蕩在生活里走，偶爾在一些似曾相識的瞬間浮上來一些描述，融在眼睛或者耳朵邊，乎微微地一閃，又落下去。我有時候感覺與文字互相認識的人身上會多長出一截什麼，不是墊高了或拉長了之類的，只是一種覆蓋在周身的存在，會翕忽的，隨空氣里的水流往回地搖，不想它搖也要搖，它需要這樣呼吸，呼吸下去，把人也帶得開始晃動，在平地上時時地站不穩。 我猜測文字的用處只是在這裡，讓人感受到風，下一步不是飛，只是站不穩而已。 ✨ “What she needs are stories. Stories are a way to preserve one’s self. To be remembered. And to forget. Stories come in so many forms: in charcoal, and in song, in paintings, poems, films. And books.

item.title: Light Catcher & Life Record
item.description: Life is a palette and I put colors on it! 😎 🫧 Voice of Delight 🫧 Summer in the Summer Palace 🚣‍♀️ 時光飛逝。今年已經是我在交大的第四年。 打開相冊，這裡不知不覺已經記錄了三輪交大的春夏秋冬，每一張的記憶都難以複製，每一張的瞬間都還歷歷在目。接著我翻開日記，尋找那些散落在過去的亮晶晶的時刻—— Spring✖️春日來信 🍃

item.title: Association Experience in LAMP
item.description: Love and Music Performance 愛生活，愛音樂，我們是LAMP音樂聯盟 Overview Brief Introduction LAMP, known as Beijing Jiaotong University LAMP Music Association, is one of the most influential music clubs in Beijing. In this universe of LAMP, there are five warm asteroids: Performance Department, Public Relations Department, Propaganda Department, Activity Department and Orchestra. 在LAMP的官方解釋中：L-life，A-and，M-music，P-performance. 一路走來，LAMP度過她的十三個春秋。在這裡，有幕前的霓虹閃爍，也有幕後的點燈同行。 Highlights Performance Department：玩轉音樂的LAMP金話筒｜R&B Rap 流行 民謠 搖滾 十分多元 Public Relations Department：LAMP第一生產力｜與金主爸爸們鬥智鬥勇的反派角色 Propaganda Department：LAMP第一記錄者｜致力讓全宇宙都聽到LAMP的聲音 Activity Department：統領全局，掌控全場｜你看到的舞台，由我們點亮 Orchestra：LAMP樂團，無樂不做｜放飛自我，震翻排練室 My Role As the minister of the propaganda department, I am in charge of the editorial promotion and regular maintenance of the WeChat official account of Beijing Jiaotong University LAMP Music Association Have published 25 passages with illustrations and texts, accumulating 2.

item.title: Shared Study Room WeChat Mini Program
item.description: A Wechat Mini Program which allows students to book shared study rooms and find study partners. Project from National Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training For College Students Overview Brief Introduction Based on people’s thirst for knowledge in today’s society and the rise of the sharing economy, especially the increasing demand of college students for study rooms, we try to create a study room with a higher degree of freedom and more satisfying user experience.

item.title: Internship as Community Operation at ByteDance
item.description: Xiaohe Health is a medical and health care brand under ByteDance. It cooperates with authoritative medical institutions and experts at home and abroad to jointly build more than 800 categories and more than 40 million structured content in the medical and health field, popular science articles on health knowledge, expert Q&A and videos. It provides users with an authoritative and understandable medical and health content library. Overview Brief Introduction Intending to truly understand how big data and algorithms could be used to conduct “the art of persuasion” to the target users through social media, I chose to undertake my internship at the Department of Content Operations in ByteDance.

item.title: Research Experience
item.description: 1. Overview 1.1 Brief Introduction Social media has provided multiple ways for individuals and organizations to connect and communicate with each other. Social media platforms such as WeChat, Weibo, and webcasting platforms are widely used in the public’s daily life and dominate the media. These media are often simple to use, have low barriers to use, and are updated quickly, allowing for timely publication and quicker feedback. In this context, Professor Wang of the City University of Hong Kong sponsored this academic research project.
